alex.wilton.cs4303.p1.game.entity

Class Bomber

  • java.lang.Object
    • alex.wilton.cs4303.p2.game.entity.Entity
      • alex.wilton.cs4303.p2.game.entity.Bomber

  • public class Bomber
extends Entity
    Class to model and draw a Bomber. A Bomber flies across the screen and drops particles when over one city.
